objective_placements.name: Standard Placement
objective_placements.description: Three primary objectives in a triangle formation
objective_placements.setup: Place three primary objective markers in a triangle formation, equidistant from each other and the table center

objective_placements.name: Center Control
objective_placements.description: One primary objective in center, two secondary objectives on flanks
objective_placements.setup: Place one primary objective marker in the center of the table, and two secondary objective markers on opposite flanks

objective_placements.name: Line Formation
objective_placements.description: Three primary objectives in a line
objective_placements.setup: Place three primary objective markers in a straight line across the center of the table

objective_placements.name: Diamond Formation
objective_placements.description: Four primary objectives in a diamond pattern
objective_placements.setup: Place four primary objective markers in a diamond formation around the table center

objective_placements.name: Cross Formation
objective_placements.description: Five objectives in a cross pattern
objective_placements.setup: Place one primary objective marker in the center, and four secondary objective markers in a cross pattern around it

objective_placements.name: Hexagonal Formation
objective_placements.description: Six objectives in a hexagonal pattern
objective_placements.setup: Place six objective markers in a hexagonal pattern around the table center, alternating between primary and secondary objectives

title: Objective Placement
content:
Standard Placement

Three primary objectives in a triangle formation. Place three primary objective markers in a triangle formation, equidistant from each other and the table center.

Center Control

One primary objective in center, two secondary objectives on flanks. Place one primary objective marker in the center of the table, and two secondary objective markers on opposite flanks.

Line Formation

Three primary objectives in a line. Place three primary objective markers in a straight line across the center of the table.

Diamond Formation

Four primary objectives in a diamond pattern. Place four primary objective markers in a diamond formation around the table center.

Cross Formation

Five objectives in a cross pattern. Place one primary objective marker in the center, and four secondary objective markers in a cross pattern around it.

Hexagonal Formation

Six objectives in a hexagonal pattern. Place six objective markers in a hexagonal pattern around the table center, alternating between primary and secondary objectives.
